name: Blind Mobile
description:
!!!!! Game entirely in Portuguese Brazilian !!!!!

Blind M is a College project done by a group of roughly 8 people, such game's concept is to try to bring in the blind people to a specific time of game genre in which it would be the visual-novel/mystery type games, we successfully narrowed it down to simplify movement and had many concepts, butt for the due date we got this apk demo for you guys
